CustomField.description: Optional shipping street for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's "Shipping Street" field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional shipping street for the item's ordered on the order line. If left blank, the value of this field will be updated with the value of the parent order's "Shipping Street" field.
CustomField.label: Shipping Street
